ygData.subject: Re: Gemcutter Patterns
ygData.msgSnippet: Agreed -- this is the most probable lead we have so far. Great thinking. -Mauldoon, now working with the tinkering community. :) ... From: Eric Baker
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed -- this is the most probable lead we have so far. Great thinking.


-Mauldoon, now working with the tinkering community. :)

----- Original Message -----
From: Eric Baker <ericb76@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, February 18, 2000 5:04 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Gemcutter Patterns


> From: "Eric Baker" <ericb76@...>
>
> All this talk about the patterns and sketches has reminded me, the pottery
> sketch vendors have diety sketches which no one has figured out how to
use.
> Maybe that's what we need?
>
